name: Aston Martin
description: This list of car brands and their origins will give you more insight into the culture and history of these companies.
fullDesc: The name Aston Martin is derived partly from the name of its founder, Lionel Martin, and partly for a stretch of road in Hertfordshire, England, used for racing, called the Aston Hillclimb.

name: BMW
description: BMW started its operation in 1912 and was formed by the merger of three German companies.
fullDesc: The acronym BMW stands for Bayerische Motoren Werke GmnH, which roughly translates to Bavarian Engine Works Company.

name: Ferrari
description: Ferrari is derived from the word meaning blacksmith.
fullDesc: The luxury car brand Ferrari is named after its Italian founder, Enzo Ferrari, who was an official Alto race driver. In 1939, he quit racing to build his own company.

name: Ford
description: Henry Ford founded the Ford Motors Company in 1903, in Detroit, Michigan.
fullDesc: It is perfected the mass production of cars by introducing moving assembly lines. This gave him the edge to cut the cost and offer an affordable car to the American middle class.

name: HONDA
description: Honda sold what was left of the company to Toyota
fullDesc: Honda was named after its founder, Soichiro Honda. Honda originally founded the manufacturer Tōkai Seiki in 1937, which produced piston rings for Toyota.

name: Mercedes
description: The model contained a newly designed engine designated.
fullDesc: Mercedes-Benz traces its origins to Karl Benz, who created the first internal combustion engine used in a car.

name: Nissan
description: The name 'Nissan' was an abbreviation used in the 1930s
fullDesc: Aikawa entered the automobile business, and the following year, he incorporated the automobile division as a new subsidiary, which he named Nissan Motor Co., Ltd.

name: Porsche

fullDesc: Automaker Henry Royce built his first motor car in 1904 and in May of that year met Charles Rolls, whose company sold quality cars in London.

name: Volkswagen
description: It was renamed simply Volkswagenwerk, or The People’s Car Company.
fullDesc: which was originally called Gesellschaft zur Vorbereitung des Deutschen Volkswagens mbH (Company for the Manufacture of the German Peoples Car).

name: Mitsubishi
description: The name Mitsubishi refers to the company's three-diamond emblem.
fullDesc: Mitsubishi officially started automobile operations in 1917, with the manufacturing of its Model A passenger car.
